short_description: 【Glimmer Night Vision】- Low-light night vision allows you to observe at night. You can be in the dark, but the object you wish to observe must have light.

The fully sealed metal body is resistant to rain splashes (binoculars cannot be fully submerged in water), dust and debris. Perfect for outdoor activities such as bird watching, traveling, hunting and stargazing, as well as cruise ship rides.

【EASY TO USE】- The mini binoculars have a wide and smooth focusing knob for easy focusing, smooth center wheel and diopter adjustments, and come with a detailed operating guide that allows even novices to focus quickly. Children can also use it easily. Comes with a cord to hang around your neck.

Combined with 15mm eye relief and twist-up eyecups, the system reduces eye strain during multi-hour observation sessions, accommodating both eyeglass wearers and direct viewers.

【Ergonomic Design for Demanding Use】The high powered binoculars are engineered for bird watching, hiking, hunting and all the outdoor adventures. Track hummingbirds through dense foliage with rapid-focus precision; Scan mountain trails for landmarks during high-altitude treks or identify game movement in low light conditions. The compact design slips effortlessly into backpack and side pockets, while the textured anti-slip grip withstands sweat, ensuring your optimal using experience.

【Professional Binocular Deployment Kit】DEESOO hunting binoculars are designed for optimizing your using experience, with helpful accessories. Our ready-to-use kit includes a durable case, neck strap, a pair of eyepiece wearers. It is an ideal choice as gift for others and for yourself! Get start your adventure with DEESOO binoculars!

name: Hontry Binoculars for Adults and Kids, 10x25 Compact Binoculars for Bird Watching, Theater and Concerts, Hunting and Sport Games
short_description: An ideal choice magnification: A 10x magnification strikes the balance between zooming in on your target and maintaining a steady image, making it an ideal choice for everyday use.
Equipped with Bak-4 prisms: These prisms deliver images with 3D depth and rich detail. Even under low-light conditions, you’ll still enjoy bright, sharp views.

Compact design: About the size of your palm and weighing only 0.6 pounds - makes it easy to carry around wherever you go. With these features, your binoculars become a reliable companion for everyday adventures rather than a tool reserved only for special occasions.

Wide range IPD: With an adjustable interpupillary distance ranging from 60mm to 75mm, they comfortably fit both kids and most adults. This means everyone in the family can share the excitement of discovering new sights together.

Your one-stop solution: these binoculars absolutely for bird watching, cruising, hiking, and traveling, but they’re not just for the outdoors—catch every thrilling moment at sporting events, concerts, plays, and more. What's more? Don’t forget the simple pleasures: Keep them handy in the car glove box, use them during a layover at the airport, or explore your own backyard. Wherever your imagination takes you, Hontry binoculars are ready to follow.
